headline: How Philip Morris International (PM) Fits into a Short-Term Dividend Capture Strategy
summary: Philip Morris International Inc. (NYSE:PM) is included among the Best High Yield Stocks to Buy in October. Philip Morris International Inc. (NYSE:PM) is an American tobacco company, with its products sold in over 180 countries. The company maintains an 80% payout ratio, which appears manageable in light of its ongoing business transformation. Smoke-free products— led […]
